title: Bite Me: A Vampire Anthology
description: Frightening and sensual, passionate and thrilling.  I have a confession to whisper at your ear. That shadow caressing your body in the dark, that tingle which draws you to arch your spine… it tempts me to ruin. You’re beautiful when you sleep.  Everything I long for.  All I ask is a sip, a taste of the life coursing through those delicate veins.  Just one little bite.  And I’ll make you mine… forever.  BITE ME features a collection of short stories from USA Today and internationally bestselling authors Addison Cain, Zoe Blake, Alta Hensley, Sara Fields, Myra Danvers, Anita Gray, Eris Adderly, Livia Bourne, & Cassandra Faye. These tales range from sensually enthralling to soul-slashing horror. Read on, and you’ll discover every beautiful shade of night.
